page.title: 09Burscough-Work on a Farm
page.content: by Barbara Being only 14 I can't yet drive on the road,but I would like to take my tractor test when I am 16.I drive most things around the farm and I drive the tractors and trailers in the field whilst the combine empties its tank.On A good night we can stay combining till past midnight and I often get the job of making the the mens baggin.I usually give them a flask of tea,sandwiches and an apple/crisps. This year we started harvesting later than most years because of all the wet and cold weather.So now even though I am back to school I spend most of my free time working.Last Sunday was a fine,dry day so we went combining even though we were very short staffed.
